pull.title: Update to latest libsecp256k1
pull.body: Includes several code cleanups and improved tests, but also fixes the OpenSSL 1.1 issue.

events.body: What was the OpenSSL issue? #7080? And will Schnorr be temporarily leaving or permanently?
